page.name: My Little Pegasus
page.description: Some say that this little guy's birth is linked somehow to the death of Medewwsa.  But that can't be right. Something this cute couldn't come from something that creepy, right?!  This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: My Little Pegasus
properties.description: Some say that this little guy's birth is linked somehow to the death of Medewwsa.  But that can't be right. Something this cute couldn't come from something that creepy, right?!  This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Garden of Good and Ebil
page.description: Someone has chicalf-napped chickencow eggs, and Zeuster wants you to bring them back!  If you're lucky, you won't need an atlas to find your way to the eggs.

properties.name: Garden of Good and Ebil
properties.description: Someone has chicalf-napped chickencow eggs, and Zeuster wants you to bring them back!  If you're lucky, you won't need an atlas to find your way to the eggs.
properties.complete: With what you had to face to get into this garden, it's a good thing you got there well before midnight! Who knows what would be prowling then?!
